name: Unofficial Notion Design System v1.1
description:
Here it is! Maybe The first (unofficial) Notion Design System, a simple file to remix with yours. You can kick start your Notion pages with this DS.


Here you can find the most common used Notion blocks converted to Figma components that are: Nested in some cases, Auto-Layout when needed, proper constraints, easy instance-swapping, and many more.


Use blocks freely or with the included simple templates to start any project.


To switch dark and light modes, only change: BG and text by the proper ones and bingo!


NOTE: I am not affiliate with Notion but love the way it can transform on what you need to boost productivity.


Next releases: I will include more blocks, like tables


Special thanks to: Carson Jones for his "Notion cover photo template".


New: font changed by Inter, now is compatible without the need to change it.
